items.title: Closed‑form bound for $L_{g_A\circ z}$ (empirical aggregator)
items.content:
2079: 
2080: Let $k=|\mathcal A(\mathcal S)|$ and assume $|v_i|\le V_{\max}$. For the empirical aggregator of §6.2.2.a (see [](#lem-empirical-aggregator-properties)) with the regularized standardization and piecewise rescale of §8.2.2, the composite map $g_A\circ z$ is globally Lipschitz with
2081: $$
2082: 
2083: \boxed{\;L_{g_A\circ z}\;\le\; \max\{\,L_P,\,1\,\}\;\cdot\; \frac{2 L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} V_{\max}}{\sqrt{k}}\;}
2084: 
2085: $$

2079: 
2080: Let $k=|\mathcal A(\mathcal S)|$ and assume $|v_i|\le V_{\max}$. For the empirical aggregator of §6.2.2.a (see [](#lem-empirical-aggregator-properties)) with the regularized standardization and piecewise rescale of §8.2.2, the composite map $g_A\circ z$ is globally Lipschitz with
2081: $$
2082: 
2083: \boxed{\;L_{g_A\circ z}\;\le\; \max\{\,L_P,\,1\,\}\;\cdot\; \frac{2 L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} V_{\max}}{\sqrt{k}}\;}
2084: 
2085: $$
2086: where $L_P=\|P'\|_\infty$ is the uniform derivative bound of the cubic patch from §8.2.2.5.

4020: 5.  **Assemble the Final Bound `F_pot,det`:**
4021:     Combining the bounds from steps 2–4 yields the final deterministic function $F_{\text{pot,det}}$. It is a sum of terms proportional to $\|\Delta\mathbf{v}_r\|^2$, $\|\Delta\mathbf{v}_d\|^2$, $n_c$, and $n_c^2$, with coefficients obtained by collecting $V_{\text{pot,max}}$, $L_{F,*}$, and the standardization constants $C_{V,\text{total}}^{(*)}$, $C_{S,\text{direct}}^{(*)}$, $C_{S,\text{indirect}}^{(*)}$. Since each constituent coefficient is finite by definition, $F_{\text{pot,det}}$ is a well-defined, continuous bound on the deterministic error. This completes the proof.
